>Tower Bridge Panoramas

16 Jan 2010

Last weekend, I mentioned some shots of Tower Bridge. I've finally got a couple uploaded. They are quite different. The first is taken from St Katherine's Docks which is a fairly cool place to be. It is only about 3Meg in size though there are blemishes here and there but for an overall result, it's not too bad.

You can view the first one here.

The second was much more ambitious. I decided to stand right in the middle of Tower Bridge and take a full panorama as a HDR image. This one weighs in at a hefty 23Meg and is a beast to download but nontheless, is pretty darn cool!


You can view the first one here, so long as you have a fast connection!
